Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw:



"Shut up." Demon said, slashing his sword at Reptilica's back.  "You will 
either lead us to your base, or give us the coordinates."

Flesh Ripper took several steps forward, watching Demon Wulf with a smile.
